entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 30%
entry.summary: Clear early this evening then partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries before morning. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h before morning. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 31 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Periods of light snow beginning near noon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early in the afternoon. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 28 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: A few flurries. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Flurries. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming west 30 km/h gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Sunday 26 February 2023
